mapper.sql: kid, zhanghao, khname, tzhanghao, zhucetime, jihuotime, dongjietime, yyzxid, shenfenid, kpassword, zhenshishoujihao, zhenshiname, yinhangname, yinhangkajao, kaihudizhi, zhifubaoid, zhuangtaiid

k.kid, k.zhanghao, k.khname, k.tzhanghao, k.zhucetime, k.jihuotime, k.dongjietime, k.yyzxid, k.shenfenid, k.kpassword, k.zhenshishoujihao, k.zhenshiname, k.yinhangname,k.yinhangkajao, k.kaihudizhi, k.zhifubaoid, k.zhuangtaiid,z.zhuangtai,j.fxjf,j.gcjf,j.ztjf,j.chjf
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from kuser k left join zhuangtai z on k.`zhuangtaiid` = z.`zhuangtaiid` left join jifen j on k.`zhanghao` = j.`zhanghao` where k.`zhuangtaiid` = 1

select
distinct
from kuser k left join zhuangtai z on k.`zhuangtaiid` = z.`zhuangtaiid` left join jifen j on k.`zhanghao` = j.`zhanghao` where k.`zhuangtaiid` != 1

select
distinct
from kuser
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into kuser (kid, zhanghao, khname, tzhanghao, zhucetime, jihuotime, dongjietime, yyzxid, shenfenid, kpassword, zhenshishoujihao, zhenshiname, yinhangname, yinhangkajao, kaihudizhi, zhifubaoid, zhuangtaiid) values (#{kid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tzhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhucetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jihuotime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dongjietime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yyzxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shenfenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhenshishoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhenshiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yinhangname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yinhangkajao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kaihudizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhifubaoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhuangtaiid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

zhanghao,

mapper.update:
update kuser
kid = #{record.kid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zhanghao = #{record.zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
khname = #{record.khname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tzhanghao = #{record.tzhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zhucetime = #{record.zhucetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jihuotime = #{record.jihuotime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dongjietime = #{record.dongjietime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yyzxid = #{record.yyzxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shenfenid = #{record.shenfenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

zhuangtaiid = #{record.zhuangtaiid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update kuser set kid = #{record.kid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zhanghao = #{record.zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, khname = #{record.khname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tzhanghao = #{record.tzhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhucetime = #{record.zhucetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jihuotime = #{record.jihuotime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dongjietime = #{record.dongjietime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yyzxid = #{record.yyzxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenfenid = #{record.shenfenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kpassword = #{record.kpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhenshishoujihao = #{record.zhenshishoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhenshiname = #{record.zhenshiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yinhangname = #{record.yinhangname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yinhangkajao = #{record.yinhangkajao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kaihudizhi = #{record.kaihudizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhifubaoid = #{record.zhifubaoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhuangtaiid = #{record.zhuangtaiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
